short_description: galt baby is a children clothing supplier based in chicago, illinois, united states.
long_description: established in 1976, galt toys + galt baby is a family-owned company offering a curated selection of strollers, car seats, toys and baby gear for discerning parents who want only the safest, healthiest and functional products for their children. from top-rated car seats & strollers, high chairs, nursery furniture and other baby gear, we aim to provide the very best products that fit in with your lifestyle. for frequent travelers, we offer a variety of compact solutions to make life on-the-go with kids just a little bit easier. in addition, we have all the baby essentials you need to create a baby registry, including baby bottles, bathtubs, towels, swaddle blankets and much more. the innovative system is crafted to offer a secure and convenient option for busy lifestyles, enabling effortless transitions from car seat to stroller in mere moments. life is better for pets and for people when it's shared. galt toys + galt baby is a local, family-owned baby shop serving the chicagoland area for over 40 years.
